story line: you learn that there are bottles with messages that would lead you to a chest full of gold. You have to follow the first bottle before you can find the other bottles. But due to a storm, a lot of the words are missing. It is up to you as the explorer to figur out the story based on the words given. Good luck!
bottle 4: pile of bones with human skull; search
bottle 6: distance between; x marks the spot
